bot.description: Hey ho! I'll help you manage your favourite stickers. Click a button below to start, and I will explain everything I can do in great detail.
bot.about:
I will help you manage your stickers. Please drop @mrGauz or @danielbilyk a line in case I misbehave.
TODO: channel link {bot_username}
bot.help_command: Is there anybody here to listen to my story...

errors.unsupported_update: ??? Sorry, I can't process whatever this is.
errors.no_sets:
You haven't got any. Yet.

Send me an image or a sticker and I'll create a sticket set for you.
errors.no_group_chats: Sorry, I'd like it to stay between us. Send me a dm.
errors.unknown_document_type: Sorry, I can't process this document type yet.
errors.file_too_big: Sorry, this file is too big (max 20 MB).
errors.not_subscribed: You don't have an active PROscription. Run /subscription to get one.
errors.sticker_not_moved: Sorry, I couldn't move the sticker. Please try again later.
errors.sticker_not_deleted: Sorry, I coulnd't delete the sticker. Please try again later.
errors.set_not_deleted: Sorry, I coulnd't delete the sticker set {set_title}. Please try again later.
errors.invalid_emoji: Hm, this seems to be an invalid emoji. Please try again (or send /cancel to abort).
errors.emoji_not_changed: Sorry, I couldn't change the emoji. Please try again later.
errors.set_not_renamed: Sorry, I couldn't rename the set to {new_name}.
errors.takes_time_warning: I'm on it, but it might take a while. I'll let you know when I'm done.
errors.some_telegram_error: Something went wrong, try again later.
errors.invoice_generation: ??? Failed to send you an invoice, try again later.
errors.pre_checkout_query_failed: I'm sorry, I couldn't process your payment. Please try again later.
errors.sticker_not_saved: I'm sorry, I couldn't save the sticker. Please try again later.
errors.move_set_full: Sorry, this set is full. Please choose another one.

sets.first_set_created: Congratulations, you've just created your first sticker set! It's called {set_title}. Save it to your favourites and send it to your friends.
sets.new_set_created: Congratulations, you've just created a new sticker set! It's called {set_title}. Save it to your favourites and send it to your friends.
sets.choose_new_name: Choose a new name for your set (or send /cancel to abort):
sets.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete {set_title}? There's no going back after it.
sets.full_warning: This is the last sticker I'm saving here, the set is full now. You can delete some unused stickers to make room for new ones. Otherwise, I will create a new one the next time.

stickers.new_saved: Job done. Here's the info about the sticker: · Sticket set: {set_title} · Emoji: " {emoji} ". If you'd like to change anything, just send me the sticker again.
stickers.first_ever_sticker_saved: Congratulations, you've just created your first sticker set! It's called {set_title}. Save it to your favourites and send it to your friends.
stickers.choose_new_emoji: Choose a new emoji for this sticker (or send /cancel to abort):
stickers.choose_set_to_move: Choose a set to move the sticker to:
stickers.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this sticker?
stickers.last_sticker_deleted: Since it was the last sticker in the set {set_title}, I deleted the set as well.

subscription.invoice_description: PROscribe to get access to all the features.
subscription.not_active: You don't have an active PROscription. Press the button below to get one.
subscription.status: Your PROscription is active until {date}. Press the button below to get additional 365 days.
subscription.payment_success: Thank you for your purchase! Your PROscription is active until {date}.
subscription.deny_precheckout: I don't know how you got here, but you can't buy this.
subscription.renewal_reminder: Your PROscription ends in {days_left} days. Run /subscription to renew it.
subscription.voucher_activated: Congratulations, your PROscription is prolonged by {days} days. Use /subscription to learn more.
subscription.voucher_already_used: Good job, you've found an easter egg. But this one was already found and used by someone else.
